content: Hello! Thank you for reaching out to XYZ Home Services. My name is Ava, your virtual assistant. Can I get your name so I know who I'm helping today?
Hi Michelle, thanks for letting me know! What address will we be coming to for your service?
Thank you! Can you tell me a little more about the plumbing issue you're having?
Our kitchen sink is leaking under the cabinet. It's pretty bad.
Got it, that sounds urgent! When would you like us to come out and take care of the leak? Our team can often come out the same day.
I actually need to check with my husband first before I book anything.

No problem at all, Michelle. I understand wanting to check first. If you want, I can hold your info so it's ready when you're ready to book. Please let us know when you want to scheduleâ€”I'm here to help!
reason: Customer needs to consult spouse before booking.
